full_summary:
=====================================

### Invitation to Bid for Fumigant Detection Systems

**Publication Date** | 16 February 2023
**Tender Closing Date** | 07 March 2023, 14:00:00 (EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to bid on the contract for the supply, installation, and commissioning of **Fumigant Detection Systems** for the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA).

**Scope of Work**

The successful supplier will provide instruments capable of simultaneous identification and accurate measurements of Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) such as solvents, fumigants, toxic industrial compounds (TICs) and other hazardous substances present in air samples from marine cargo containers.

**Key Requirements**

* Supply, installation, and commissioning of the Fumigant Detection Systems
* Instruments must be capable of simultaneous identification and accurate measurements of VOCs
* Systems must be able to detect solvents, fumigants, TICs, and other hazardous substances
* Compliance with relevant Canadian regulations and standards

**Contract Details**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User**: Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
* **Contract Duration**: Expected to commence on 20 December 2023 and end on 20 April 2024
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**How to Submit a Bid**

To access the tender documentation and submit a bid, please visit the [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15445472?extsite=MTU0NDU0NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) website.

**Note**

This tender has been posted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers who are not registered with the Campus ID system and the [Supplier Registration Service](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/services/contracts-concords) must register with both services prior to submitting a bid.
